${modID}:Neurotoxin.NAME: Neurotoxin
${modID}:Neurotoxin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Corrosion. NL ${modID}:Echo if in ${modID}:Thorns.

${modID}:CastOff.NAME: Cast Off
${modID}:CastOff.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to 1 card in your hand to Retain.
${modID}:CastOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose up to 2 cards in your hand to Retain.

${modID}:BarbedAssault.NAME: Barbed Assault
${modID}:BarbedAssault.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Thorns. For every 1 Thorns lost, deal !D! damage. Exhaust.

${modID}:AlchemicalProwess.NAME: Alchemical Prowess
${modID}:AlchemicalProwess.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|<1,>1=!M!} Attack{!M!|<1,>1=s} will apply ${modID}:Corrosion equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:CleaveTheTide.NAME: Cleave the Tide
${modID}:CleaveTheTide.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you are in ${modID}:Thorns. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:CleaveTheTide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Can only be played if you are in ${modID}:Thorns. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
${modID}:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Draw 1 card.

${modID}:EnfeeblingMixture.NAME: Enfeebling Mixture
${modID}:EnfeeblingMixture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak. NL ${modID}:Echo if enemy intends to attack.

${modID}:ChemicalSpill.NAME: Chemical Spill
${modID}:ChemicalSpill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! {modID}:Corrosion to ALL enemies. Lose 2 Dexterity.

${modID}:DefensiveGambit.NAME: Defensive Gambit
${modID}:DefensiveGambit.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Energy on your next turn. NL ${modID}:Echo if in ${modID}:Thorns.
